cause.description:
I am a type one diabetic, insulin dependent for the rest of my life...or till they find a cure. Most people dont know that this disease can be avoided by watching what you eat and keeping active with exercise. I was diagnosed right before my 13th birthday and am going on 10 years now. I would like to raise awareness about this so future parents will know about it, and learn to prevent it. Also I would like to try to raise money for the Juvenile Diabetes Research Fund
1. To help cure this disease, which is becoming a problem for today's youth
2. To inform people about this and get todays children active
cause.name: Help Cure Diabetes
